MetaTags.Content: An Advanced Tone-Up Enhancer, Brightens Skin Tone Naturally And Instantly This Tone-Up Cream brightens your skin tone instantly while minimizing the appearance of fine lines and pores. An antioxidant-rich formula provides exceptional hydration, leaving skin smooth, and healthy all day long.

        .first-letter { font-size: 4.5em; float: left; margin-top: .15em; font-family: 'EB Garamond', serif; padding: 0 5px 5px 0;}
